resources.string:
Enter flashcards here.
One flashcard per line.
Separate hint, answer with a comma.
Delete all flashcards to remove deck.
this is a very long text for testing how things work when the text is long

To Open a Deck: 
 Tap the title on the main screen. 

To See Flashcard Answer: 
 Swipe up. 

Correct Answer: 
 Swipe right. 

Wrong Answer: 
 Swipe left. 

Create a new deck: 
 Click New Deck. 
 One flashcard per line. 
 Separate hint, answer with a comma. 
 Pro move: Copy and paste your cards right in from an email. 

Edit a deck: 
 Tap deck title in flashcard view. 

Delete a deck: 
 Erase all flashcard lines, then click save.
